A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disappointed:

- What was the point of those cute things that looked like puffins?

- Poor sub casting.

- Not a lot happened.

- Weak story\, which was lazy and convenient e.g just happen to drift past an old rebel base and find another code breaker bloke in the same cell that you're locked up in WTF!

- The whole casino thing didn't work for me and was daft.

- Key scenes were copied from Retun of the Jedi and Empire Strikes Back.

Shame really as the last film promised so much in where this story could go ??
